name.en: Special topic for interdisciplinary artificial intelligence
name.ch: 人工智慧跨域應用專題

goal.en:
Utilizing the Interdisciplinary AI Credit Program in the General Education Center
Through the utilization of knowledge gained from the courses offered by the Interdisciplinary AI Credit Program in the General Education Center, students collaborate in small teams, employing a division of labor, to create their final projects. This allows students to apply their programming language skills to practical and real-world project applications. From topic selection to data collection, model development, presentation delivery, and written reports, each step presents its own difficulties and challenges, testing students‘ problem-solving abilities.
Qualities that will yield higher scores
Creative thinking and problem exploration
Efforts to independently think and efficiently solve problems
Altruism and a commitment to the greater good
Execution steps
Form AI teams and engage in small group discussions to brainstorm ideas for addressing specific business pain points or social issues. Propose AI-based solutions and conduct conceptual validation.
Assign roles within the AI teams, such as data scientists, data engineers, data analysts, and project managers.
Produce the following deliverables: comprehensive discourse, AI models or algorithms, data collection and analysis processes, human-computer interaction interfaces, project websites, and project presentations.
Encourage participation in suitable AI competitions.
goal.ch:
運用通識教育中心人工智慧跨域學分學程所開設之課程知識，以小組團隊分工合作模式，製作期末專題。讓同學可以將所學的程式語言應用在實際落地的專題應用上。從選題、數據收集、模型製作、簡報呈現、書面報告等，各有難度以及需克服的地方，考驗同學面對問題，解決問題的能力。
表現出以下特質的同學，將可獲得較多分數：
1. 創意思考，挖掘問題
2. 嘗試以有效率的方式，獨立思考，解決問題
3. 利他主義，共好主義
執行步驟：
1. 分組成立AI團隊，小組討論，針對某商業痛點或社會議題進行發想，提出包含AI技術的解決方案並實作概念驗證
2. AI團隊分工：資料科學家、資料工程師、資料分析師、專案經理
3. 產出成果：完整論述、AI模型或演算法、資料收集分析處理流程、人機互動介面、專題網站、專題簡報
4. 參加比賽：鼓勵參加合適的AI競賽

content.en:
[Enrolling in This Course]
Please collect a password card for adding the course in Classroom 113, Literature Building 1, at 18:00 on Tuesday of the first week of classes.
[Class Schedule]
Tuesdays 18:00-21:00, in Literature Building 1, Classroom 113, for project implementation and reporting. If unable to attend, consider the alternative course “Artificial Intelligence Interdisciplinary Applications Project (Summer Session) (Same Course Number)“.
[Course Content]
The “Artificial Intelligence Interdisciplinary Applications Project“ primarily focuses on interdisciplinary applications, adopting a problem-oriented approach. Students are encouraged to use relevant mathematics and programming to address issues in business or societal pain points that interest them, propose solutions, and implement for verification.
[Course Requirements]
Project discussion report in week 7 (40％ of total grade), mid-term report in week 11 (30％ of total grade), final report in week 16 (30％ of total grade), 20 minutes per group.
[Course Regulations]
Students must complete AI programming language, basic AI, interdisciplinary AI applications, and AI social application courses relevant to their department before enrolling in AI project implementation.
[Grouping]
Grouping will be conducted in the first week of class under the guidance of the teacher.
[Password Card] https://ncuedu.tw/borglab/priority_passcode_card
content.ch:
【選修此課程】
請於開課第一週星期二18:00到文學一館113教室拿密碼卡加選
【上課時間】
週二18:00-21:00，於文一113教室進行專題實作與報告，若無法出席，建議可選「人工智慧跨域應用專題(暑修)(同課號)」
【授課內容】
人工智慧跨域應用專題以「跨域應用」方向為主，以問題導向(Problem - orientated)的方式，請修課學生運用相關的數學與程式針對自己感興趣的企業或社會痛點，提出解方並實作驗證。
【課程要求】
1. 第7週專題論述報告(占總成績40％)，第11週期中報告(占總成績30％)，第16週期末報告(占總成績30％)，每組20分鐘。
【修課規定】
學生依所屬院別，須修畢該院別於本學程所屬領域之 AI 程式語言、AI 基礎課程、AI 跨域應用及 AI 社會運用主軸課程，方可修習 AI 專題實作。
【分組】
第一週上課時在老師引導下進行分組
【密碼卡】https://ncuedu.tw/borglab/priority_passcode_card
